citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Pyrantel with expiration date of 11/2021 was used for a litter of puppies on 12/6/2021. Use of expired medication might
not be effective or with some medications cause harm to animals. Ensure to check medications regularly for expiration
date and do not use expired medications.
Correction: Correct from this day forward and do not administer expired medications.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Pyrantel with expiration date of 11/2021 was used for a litter of puppies on 12/6/2021.  Use of expired medication might 
not be effective or with some medications cause harm to animals.  Ensure to check medications regularly for expiration 
date and do not use expired medications. 
 
Correction:  Correct from this day forward and do not administer expired medications. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
